description: Dr. Alex Kalynychenko teaches at the University of Toronto Mississauga.
Dr. Alex Kalynychenko is delivering a lecture focused on Spatial Analysis.
Spatial Analysis incorporates materials and demonstrations provided by ESRI.
Carl Steinitz is the creator of the Geodesign process.

3D Analyst is an extension of ArcGIS Pro designed for spatial analysis.
Machine learning and AI technologies are applied in the context of Spatial Analysis.
Deep learning is a specific type of machine learning technique.
Big data analytics is a method used to analyze large datasets in Spatial Analysis.
Python is often utilized for modeling and scripting in data analysis.

source: U. S. Bureau of the Census
